descriptionHTML:
UIWeather is a Material Design Open Source app/project for Android 4.1+ and Android Wear Devices.

Project available on Github: https://github.com/mkiisoft/UIWeather

FEATURES:

-Amazing UI/UX
-Android Wear Support
-Watch face
-Analog
-Digital
-Stand alone app
-Forecast
-City Search
-Swipe Gestures
-HD Images

This app is still a Beta. Send reports to improve it.
